items.content:
/**
 * Профессиональные навыки
 */

import { Skills } from './types';

export const skills: Skills = [
  'React',
  'Redux (Redux Toolkit)',
  'REST API (TanStack Query)',
  'TypeScript (JavaScript)',
  'HTML, CSS (SCSS, CSS modules)',
  'Gravity UI, Tailwind CSS, Ant Design, Bootstrap',
  'Storybook',
  'Jest, Playwright',
  'Vite, Webpack',
  'Eslint, prettier',
  'Git (GitHub Actions)',
];

items.name: experience.ts

items.content:
/**

  },
